This vignette from the R package JMDplots contains supplementary plots from the paper by <a href="https://doi.org/10.3389/feart.2019.00180" title="CHNOSZ: Thermodynamic calculations and diagrams for geochemistry">Dick (2019)</a>.

```{r JMDplots, message = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(JMDplots)
```

## Comparison of logK and maximum affinity methods (Figure S1)
```{r chnsztenS1, message = FALSE, echo = 1, fig.align='center', out.width='50%', out.height='300px'}
chnsztenS1()
knitr::include_graphics("chnsztenS1.pdf")
```
